meanings.definition: The quality or state of being nutty.
meanings.sent1: The nuttinesses of the peanut butter added a delicious flavor to the sandwich.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the nuttinesses of almonds in my salad.
meanings.sent3: The nuttinesses of the squirrel made everyone laugh at the park.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a hint of nuttinesses, making the room feel warm and cozy.
meanings.sent5: The nuttinesses of the hazelnut coffee woke me up instantly.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having nut-like flavors or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The cake's nuttinesses came from the walnuts baked inside.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the nuttinesses of the pecans in the pie.
meanings.sent3: The nuttinesses of the chocolate bar surprised me in a good way.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a comforting nuttinesses that made me feel at ease.
meanings.sent5: The nuttinesses of the granola bar reminded me of hiking in the woods.
